org.drools.brms.client
Class JBRMSFeatureConfigurator

java.lang.Object
  org.drools.brms.client.JBRMSFeatureConfigurator

public class JBRMSFeatureConfigurator
extends java.lang.Object

This contains the list of configured features for the JBRMS console. Modify this to add or remove features.

 

Constructor Summary
JBRMSFeatureConfigurator()
           
 
Method Summary
static void configure(JBRMSFeatureList list)
          Adds all sinks to the list.

Constructor Detail

JBRMSFeatureConfigurator

public JBRMSFeatureConfigurator()
Method Detail

configure

public static void configure(JBRMSFeatureList list)
Adds all sinks to the list. Note that this does not create actual instances of all sinks yet (they are created on-demand). This can make a significant difference in startup time.
